description_carte: Two entities bound by shadow, Gemini represent duality and deception. Their forms flicker in and out of existence.
description_visuelle: Two ghostly figures connected at the spine by tendrils of darkness. One is gaunt and skeletal, the other bloated and decaying. They whisper constantly to each other.

skills.name: Shadow Barrage
skills.description: The Gemini launch a flurry of shadowy projectiles at the target.

skills.name: Soul Drain
skills.description: The Gemini siphon life force from the target, dealing damage and healing themselves.

skills.name: Phantom Shift
skills.description: The Gemini briefly become invulnerable, dodging the next attack.

skills.name: Dark Pact
skills.description: One Gemini sacrifices a portion of their HP to empower the other, greatly increasing their attack.

skills.name: Whispers of Doubt
skills.description: The Gemini assault the target's mind, reducing their attack.
